### Multi-Shot 40mm Launcher Solicitation
#### Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting a multi-shot, 40mm caliber launcher system consisting of a stock, receiver, and barrel assembly. The acrylic bid must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria and adhere to the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation. The RCMP may extend the contract for up to three (3) additional one-year periods.

#### Contract Details
* Contract Period: One year, with an option to extend for up to three (3) additional one-year periods.
* Deliverables: All goods must be delivered within three (3) months of contract award.
* Basis of Selection: Mandatory Technical Criteria only.
* Selection Method: The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

#### Important Information
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime, administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada, which is applicable to all contracting activities.
* Interested bidders can download bid solicitation documents and amendments through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).
* Bidders must consult GETS regularly for the most up-to-date information regarding this solicitation.
* The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this solicitation and take advantage of the opportunities available through the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.
